so_48491662: CurrV='1.5.2'
ExpecV='1.8.1'
printf -v versions '%s\n%s' "$CurrV" "$ExpecV"
if [[ $versions = "$(sort -V <<< "$versions")" ]]; then
    echo 'FAILURE'
else
    echo 'SUCCESS'
fi
